forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 63. Southwest wind 3 to 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 3 to 17 mph.

weather_report:
The morning air in Downtown San Francisco whispers of mildness and clarity, perfectly aligned with today’s forecast. As the sun rises and casts a gentle glow across the city, you can sense a pleasant warmth gradually filling the streets, with temperatures edging near a comfortable 63. The swaying palms seem to nod in agreement with the soft southwest winds, which dance around at manageable speeds, adding just the right touch of movement to the scene. 

While the day unfolds under predominantly sunny skies, a hint of marine layers lingers at the periphery. The rolling fog, often shy and ephemeral, may still cast a veil over the bay but remains largely at bay, offering the promise of a beautifully clear day. For those contemplating their attire, light layers will serve admirably; a light jacket or a cozy sweater might just be the perfect addition for the evening’s descent into cooler temperatures. 

With such ideal conditions, consider a leisurely stroll down by the waterfront or perhaps a quaint visit to one of the city's many artisanal cafes, where you can sip on a warm drink as you watch the world go by. The open-air music venues might call your name, or simply roaming the vibrant streets of the Mission District could make for a splendid afternoon, where colors and culture collide in the best of ways.
